bibl.title: A Water Temple at Bir Abu Safa (Eastern Desert)
bibl.note: Temple façade carved into the face of a sandstone mountain, near a scare water supply. Portions of a Greek dedication by Ptolemy III Euergetes survive above the faux door. - Background and location. - Geology. - Description. - Parallels.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., Gabriel T. MIKHAIL, James A. HARRELL and Roger S. BAGNALL, A Water Temple at Bir Abu Safa (Eastern Desert).

Temple façade carved into the face of a sandstone mountain, near a scare water supply. Portions of a Greek dedication by Ptolemy III Euergetes survive above the faux door. - Background and location. - Geology. - Description. - Parallels.
